ComicInfo.Summary:
Mark Jackson is a wanted man. One of the few black people in Topequa, Florida, Jackson is now the victim of racial crime, doggedly pursued by corrupt sheriff Wallace Corlee. But the Man-Thing has heard Markâ€™s plight and understands. Will justice be served in the heart of the swamps?
No Choice of Colors! - A black man being and the racist southern sheriff pursuing him stumble into the Man-Thing's swamp. Who will survive? The Face of Horror - The world's ugliest man has a plan to change his life around - but what will be the price?
ComicInfo.Title: No Choice of Colors!
